desc: Gold Coast & B based Ocean Electrics have been the leaders in marine electrical and general electrical services for over 30 years. Ocean Electrics is driven by a skilled team of electrical fitters and mechanics who specialise in AC & DC systems, new builds to large scale refits, general maintenance and thermal imaging.

layout.text: Trusted for over 30 years, Ocean Electrics are the leaders in marine electrical services led by a team of highly experienced fitters and mechanics.
